column1:
Conjugate in the present of the subjunctive.
gustar
to like (intr.), to please
column2:
gustar
(present subjunctive)
(a mí) me guste
(a tí) te guste
(a él, ella, Ud.) le guste
(a nosotros) nos guste
(a vosotros) os guste
(a ellos, Uds.) les guste
Note that the conjugation of gustar depends on the quantity of what is being liked, not who is doing the liking.
Ex. ...that we like the book. ...que nos guste el libro.
...that I like the books. ...que me gusten los libros.
